weeks.summary:
Here is Lili's weekly summary for the period 2025-11-16 to 2025-11-23.

【Toilet】
The toilet training failure rate this week was 0%. If the number of accidents increases over consecutive days, it may be worth reviewing the daily routine or checking your dog's physical condition.

【Meals】
Your dog ate an average of 30g of food per day. Appetite appears to be relatively stable, but if there were days with less intake than usual, factors such as physical condition or mood may have influenced it.

【Walks & Activity】
Walks averaged 9 minutes per day, covering approximately 0.1 km. If this is significantly more or less than usual, it may indicate a change in activity level.

【Sleep】
Your dog slept an average of 0.83 hours per day. If there were days with notably less sleep, stress or environmental changes might be affecting their rest.

【Barking】
There was no notable nighttime barking. It was a calm week overall.

This concludes the weekly summary for Lili.
If any concerning patterns continue, please keep monitoring them along with next week's records.
texts: 2025-11-20 [food] Since she barked a lot we gave him food a bit earlier
2025-11-20 [play] She licked us with smellly tounge
2025-11-20 [walk] we walked in the house since outside was rainy
